P, Q, R = map(int, input().split())

print(min(P+Q, Q+R, R+P))
import sys

def main():
    P, Q, R = map(int, input().split())
    print(min(P+Q, Q+R, R+P))

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

N, M = map(int, input().split())

print(N * M - N - M + 1)
import sys

def main():

    print(min(A+B, B+C, C+A))
